resources.string: Battery too low to install system update. Please connect charger to continue.
Battery too low to install system update. Please wait for battery to charge sufficiently.
System updates can\'t be downloaded while roaming.
Your system is currently up to date.
Download of system update was unsuccessful.
Download was unsuccessful, please try again.
There was a problem downloading the update.
There was a problem installing the update.
A system update is ready to install. Your phone will restart and install the update. You will not be able to make any calls, including emergency calls, during installation.
A system update is ready, but the battery is too low to install it. Please connect charger.
A system update is ready, but the battery is too low to install it. Please wait for battery to charge sufficiently.
Allows applications to read data from the Google Talk content provider.
Allows applications to write data to the Google Talk content provider.
Exchanges messages and receives sync notifications from Google servers

Used for server cloud to device messages and for sync notifications. Google Talk uses this service to exchange messages and to synchronize presence status. A malicious application could use this service to transmit excess data.
Allows the applications to accept cloud to device messages sent by the application\'s service. Using this service will incur data usage. Malicious applications may cause excess data usage.
Can broadcast data messages received from the internet to applications registered to listen for them.
send and receive XMPP stanzas to and from Google servers
Allows Google applications to send and receive XMPP stanzas to and from Google backend servers.
Can broadcast XMPP messages received from the Google servers to applications registered to listen for them.
Can send broadcasts to Android Market requesting application installation and removal.
Send heartbeat to Google Talk server
Can send a heartbeat packet to the Google Talk server to ensure the health of the connection.
%s wants to be able to chat
You have received a group chat invitation from %s
You cannot send messages over 2000 characters in length.
You missed a video chat invite
You missed a voice chat invite
You missed a video chat invite because you weren\'t connected to Wi-Fi
You missed a voice chat invite because you weren\'t connected to Wi-Fi
%1$s tried to initiate a video chat with you
%1$s tried to initiate a voice chat with you
%1$s tried to start a video chat with you while you weren\'t connected to Wi-Fi
%1$s tried to start a voice chat with you while you weren\'t connected to Wi-Fi
%1$s was not available for video chat.
%1$s was not available for voice chat.
You ended the video chat with %1$s.
You ended the voice chat with %1$s.
Sorry! The video chat with %1$s failed because of a network problem. Please try again.
Sorry! The voice chat with %1$s failed because of a network problem. Please try again.
Google Talk failed to login. If this is a Google Apps account, confirm that Chat service is enabled for this account.
Touch any text box to start typing
You don\'t have a SIM card installed in the phone, so it can\'t connect to a mobile network for voice or data services. You can connect to a Wi-Fi network without a SIM.
You don’t have a network connection.

This could be a temporary problem or your phone may not be provisioned for data services. Please try again when connected to a mobile network, or connect to a Wi-Fi network. If the problem continues, call Customer Care
A problem occurred while communicating with Google servers.
Can’t establish a reliable data connection to the server.
This could be a temporary problem or your phone may not be provisioned for data services. If it continues, call Customer Care.
Invalid character. Only 0-9, a-z, A-Z, and periods are allowed.
Your phone is not connected to a data service. To view this information now, go to %s from any computer connected to the Internet.
This is not a valid domain name
This is not a valid username
Enter your username only, not your email address
This is not a valid account name

It’s easy to set up your phone! All you need is a Google Account.

Why use a Google Account?

With a Google Account, Google applications are automatically synced between your phone and computer, regardless of where you make an update.

Already have a Google Account?

Then you’re all set! Simply touch “Sign in” on the next screen.

Don’t have a Google Account?

No problem. Touch “Create” on the next screen and we’ll help you set one up.

Touch ”Next” to get started!
Slide your finger up or down the screen to scroll.\n(Touch this message to dismiss it.)
Sign in with the Google Account you want linked to this phone.
Sign in with an enterprise account configured to use Google services.
Want to set up an account later?
By continuing, you agree to the Google and Additional Privacy Policies.
Your phone needs to communicate with Google servers to set up your account. This may take up to five minutes.
Your phone needs to communicate with Google servers to find your domain information. This may take up to five minutes.
By signing in, you agree to the Google and Additional Privacy Policies.
Sign in with your Google Account:
Use this screen if you have special login considerations that require a Web browser.
This phone cannot access your Google or Google Apps account. Re-authorization is required.
Enter your username and password for ^1:
This account cannot be used on the phone because it belongs to an inactive domain. Please contact the domain administrator for ^1 or sign in with another account.
The text entered is not a valid username.

There is a problem connecting to your company's servers at ^1.

Error information:
The web login page has redirected for too many times
This account has been disabled. \n\n(For details, go to http://google.com/accounts on your computer.)
Your username and password do not match. Please try again. \n\n(To recover your account information, go to http://google.com/accounts on your computer.)

This account has not been verified. Please check your email on a computer and follow the link to verify this account. \n\n(To recover your account information, go to http://google.com/accounts on your computer.)
Type the characters you see in the picture below:
By creating this account you agree to the Google and Additional Privacy Policies.\u0020
^1 contains less than 6 or more than 30 characters.
^1 can contain only letters,\nnumbers, and periods.
Your passwords don’t match. Please re-type them.
In case you lose your password.
The password is too weak or contains invalid characters. Please try again.
An error occurred. Please try again.
There is already a ^1 account on this phone
Your Google Account is now linked to this phone.

Google applications are syncing data now. 

%i When the ”syncing” icon disappears from the status bar at the top of your screen, the download has finished.

About the status bar…

Whenever you receive a new message or other notification, an icon appears in the status bar.

Use your finger to drag down the status bar to open the Notifications panel, with details about all your current notifications.
Touch here to re-run Setup Wizard

Quick setup 
You have opened an application that requires you link a Google Account to your phone. It’s easy and only takes a few steps. 

Google applications will always be in sync between your phone and computer. 

Touch “Next” to continue or press the Back button to exit.

Adding an account 

You can use more than one Google Account on your phone (such as your home and work accounts). Adding a Google Account takes just a few steps. 

Touch “Next” to continue or press your phone's Back button to exit.

You need to link a Google mail account with this phone. 

You already have a Google mail username (^1) associated with this account, but it is not currently active. 

Touch “Next” to re-activate this username and use it with your phone. 

Or, if you want to use a different account, press the Back button and sign in with or create a different account.
The following information will help you recover your password if it is ever lost
The email address entered is not valid.\n Example: joe@example.com
Secondary email addresses cannot be the same as the one you are creating

There are some important things to understand to get the most out of your phone. 
 
Using the onscreen keyboard
 
Touch “Begin” to start the tutorial and find out more.

There are some important things to understand to get the most out of your phone. 
 
Using the onscreen keyboard 
Setting up a Google Account
 
Touch “Begin” to start the tutorial and find out more or touch “Skip” to skip this tutorial and continue.
Touch any text field to open the keyboard and start typing. Try it here!
Done typing? Press your phone\'s Back button to close the keyboard.
Google\'s location service provides applications with your approximate location without using GPS.
You can disable these features in Settings, under Location & Security \u0020and under Search.
Allow Google\'s location service to collect anonymous location data. Collection will occur even when no applications are running.
Use My Location for Google search results and other Google services.

Your settings (such as your bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) can be backed up automatically to your Google Account. If you get a new phone (to replace one you lost or if you upgrade), your settings are restored onto your new phone.
You can change your backup settings at any time in the Settings application, under Privacy.
Back up settings to my Google Account.
If you have previously backed up your settings, they will be restored.
Your settings will not be restored from backup.
Your company\'s servers are sending sign-in information to your phone. This may take a few minutes.\nYour company\'s sign-in page will appear when this is complete.
This domain is not using Google Apps. Please check the domain name and try again.
Do you want to allow Google to use location for improved search results and other services?
Allows this application to read Google settings.
Allows this application to modify Google settings.
Allows this application to read Google service configuration data.
Allows this application to modify Google service configuration data.
access to passwords for Google accounts
Allows applications direct access to the passwords for the Google account(s) you have configured.
select Gmail or Google Mail branding
Allows applications to switch the phone between \"Gmail\" and \"Google Mail\" branding.
Allows applications to see the usernames (email addresses) of the Google account(s) you have configured.
Allows applications to sign in to ALL Google services using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to unspecified Google services using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google mail services using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Calendar using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Android services using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Checkout (and potentially make purchases) using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Checkout QA using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Checkout Sandbox using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to YouTube using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to see the YouTube username(s) associated with the Google account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Talk using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to iGoogle using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Picasa Web Albums using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google mobile applications using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to access the contacts and profile information of account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google AdSense using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google AdWords using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Blogger using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Dodgeball using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Base using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Groups using the account(s) stored on this phone
Allows applications to sign in to Google Health using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to JotSpot using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Knol using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google News using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Orkut using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Book Search using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Webmaster Tools using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google WiFi using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Docs using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Spreadsheets using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Finance using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Maps using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google App Engine using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Notebook using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Voice using the account(s) stored on this phone.
Touch to sign into your account.

There was a network error while trying to sign in to ^1. Retry now or press the Back button to cancel.
\u0020Your domain requires mobile device management. Please install the Google Apps Device Policy application to enforce security policies required by the ^1 account.
The username or password isn\'t valid. A ^1 account is required. Please try again.\u0020
You entered the wrong password or your account has changed. Please re-enter your password.
Type the password for this account.
Please sign in into your enterprise account at ^1 for authentication.\nTouch Sign in to open your company\'s web-based sign-in page.
You cannot use that account in this situation. Please try a different account.
Don\'t have a YouTube account? Touch here to create one.
Your phone is not connected to a data service. To view this information now, go to %s from any computer connected to the Internet.
Your phone is not connected to a data service. To view this information now, go to %s from any computer connected to the Internet.
Your company\'s servers are sending sign-in information to your phone. This may take a few minutes.\nYour company\'s sign-in page will appear when this is complete.
Your phone needs to communicate with Google servers to set up your account. This may take up to five minutes.
